definitions.name: InstantiateMsg
definitions.description: Just needs to know the code_id of a reflect contract to spawn sub-accounts

definitions.name: Uint64
Binary
definitions.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization
with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>.
See also <https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/blob/main/docs/MESSAGE_TYPES.md>.

channel_id.description: Existing channel where the packet was received

packet_sequence.description: Sequence number of the packet that was received

account.description:
Returns (reflect) account that is attached to this channel,
or none.

list_accounts.description:
Returns all (channel, reflect_account) pairs.
No pagination - this is a test contract

definitions.name: Empty
definitions.description:
An empty struct that serves as a placeholder in different places,
such as contracts that don't set a custom message.

It is designed to be expressible in correct JSON and JSON Schema but
contains no meaningful data. Previously we used enums without cases,
but those cannot represented as valid JSON Schema (https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/issues/451)
